lenders.loan_because: in my line of work I see how funding at any level can transform a life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a fundraiser on the college/university level and currently oversee all aspects of fundraising, all related communications and alumni relations. The most important part of my work is to build community in an atmosphere that enriches the lives of everyone involved.

lenders.name: K Marcure Scholarships
lenders.loan_because: The Kenneth Marcure Scholarship Fund was established to encourage a combination of education and empathy. Students who receive scholarships also manage a portfolio of loans to entrepreneurs struggling to escape poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Before Kenneth Marcure died in July 2012 after struggling with ALS for 5 years, he asked that a scholarship fund be established to realize the motto: Donors and supporters are committed to realizing our motto: Learn and Share!

lenders.name: Jo
lenders.loan_because: I hope that in a small way I'm helping people less advantaged than I am, to make a better life for themselves.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: Some of the most creative business people I have met are in developing countries.  It's great to be able to be connected to those needing loans.

lenders.occupational_info: Im online marketer on network marketer bussiness over the world to make better life in the future even time world hit economical crisis

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other entreprenuers be successful and realize their goals.

lenders.name: Shauna-Lee
lenders.loan_because: I have a blessed life, so am sharing when I can spare.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the timetabling operations at the University of Tasmania.

lenders.name: Absolute Smile
lenders.occupational_info: Absolute Smile was co-founded in 2004 by Drs. Eric and Boris Friedman. Second generation dentists, they both share the great passion for dentistry .Six years later they still represent the core of a much larger business that combines four modern dental facilities in four different locations in the greater Philadelphia area and Pocono. Dr. Eric Friedman graduated at the top of his class from the University Of Pennsylvania School Of Dentistry in 1999 and then completed post-graduate residency program at the Sacred Heart Hospital in Allentown Pa., where he devoted most of his time in developing and perfecting techniques of cosmetic dentistry. Dr. Boris Friedman successfully graduated from Temple University School of Dentistry in 2000 and immediately enrolled in private practice mastering the skills of Endodontics and Oral Surgery.

lenders.name: OutofYourMind.org
lenders.loan_because: I loan because it's important to actively seeking out opportunities to be of service to others... We have to be mindful of building people up, rather than tearing them down. All it takes is just one loan to truly make a difference in the life of an individual, a family and a community.
lenders.occupational_info: My work would be best described as discovering ways to Improve lives through offering business and personal solutions, geared toward creating wealth, abundance and prosperity through the power that each one of us possesses.

lenders.name: Sepideh
lenders.loan_because:
"Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened.  Happiness never decreases by being shared".  
~Buddha

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I started my own business on a credit card in 2004. We live in such abundance here in the US. Money is just a tool--I believe in giving others the tools to reach their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to non-native speakers so they can thrive living here in the USA. I also run my own small-town wine & cheese shop. My customers are my bosses: I serve them and they keep me in business!

lenders.name: Jenifer
lenders.loan_because: I find myself blessed with family and friends that support me in reaching my goals and dreams. I want to be  able to help (even if it is in a small way) support someone elses dreams and aspirations.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a college student working towards becoming a professional chef.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: Life is more valuable than money.

lenders.loan_because: i want to start helping others achieve something in life

lenders.loan_because: Adding drops to fill up the bucket.
lenders.occupational_info: I talk to computers in their language.

lenders.name: Tin
lenders.loan_because: I want to contribute - even in a small way
lenders.occupational_info: I make websites (like this one - kiva.org) for an organization that is also involved in international development. We try to help the community by building useful tools.

lenders.loan_because: I think that if everyone works together to share wealth, we can make the world a much happier and fairer place.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Admin department of a Life Insurance company.

lenders.occupational_info: We are a non-profit charity organization working to provide education and food to poor children in India.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone else even if its just a little. Sometimes a little is all you have and 25 bucks can make a difference.

lenders.occupational_info: I am working as a System Administrator in Government Hospital, but  I am self motivated to the production of some arts and musical performances, so I  own a small home studio with which I thing will help to change the life of others too and thru Kiva I hope those who will come close will benefit acording to their nees. Thanks to Kiva!!

lenders.name: adebiyi
lenders.loan_because:
I LOAN BECAUSE I JUST WANT THE LIFE TO ADD A MORE JOY TO ME AND MY GOOD FAMILY.
I AM WITH THREE CHILDREN AND MY WIFE, MY BROTHER DIED JUST OF RECENT HE LEFT WITH ME NOTHING BUT ALL HIS FOUR CHILDREN,WITH OUR FATHER AND MOTHER IN POVERTY.
I AM, THE ONLY PERSON THAT CARE FOR THE RESPONSIBILITY OF THEM ALL WITHOUT HELPER.
I WILL BE VERY GREATFULL IF I CAN GET LOAN TO BOOST MY TRADING WORK SELLING COMODITIES SUCH AS BAG OF RICE,BEANS,PROVISION.ETC
lenders.occupational_info: BUSINESS MEN IS MY CARRIER I DESCRIBE IT TO THE WORLD AS BEST WORK IF I CAN GET A LOAN TO INCREASE THE MARKET

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: the world is better because of small businesses who care about their communities

lenders.name: Ben Braverman
lenders.loan_because: I am currently in the process of becoming a financial advisor having earned a business degree.  Providing loans to those who are less fortunate is a natural extension of my interest and enthusiasm for adding value and befit to people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Much of the public here in the United States, is not fully aware of the options as it relates to investment.  I will help to provide the tools with which people can substantially improve their financial situations.

lenders.name: ginny
lenders.loan_because: I loan through Kiva because of the personal experience they provide between the lender and borrower.  It's not just a transaction, it's a transformation.

lenders.name: Noah
lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneurs, whether big or small, whether starting technology companies or waste management processing facilities, are all filled with ideas and creativity but often starved for capital. If my money can provide the lubricant to create a functioning profitable business for other entrepreneurs then go forth and multiply.
lenders.occupational_info: As a program director I oversee and streamline the efficiency of our various project units and project managers. Through leadership and business process re-engineering, I facilitate cohesive teams focused on accomplishing the mission at hand. I may be the leader but I never forget everyone working on the project is in control and keeping them healthy, happy, and motivated is my priority above all else.

lenders.name: Carter McLaughlin
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance at success and happiness.
